```{python}
#| label: fig-plot
#| fig-cap: "sine plot"

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.linspace(0, 2*np.pi)
y = np.sin(x)

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot(x, y)
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
